question:
Is the following statement something you would say?
"I feel what is moral and right is very important to me and guides how I act towards others"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I willingly sacrifice my own self-interest for the well being of another person"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe the best strategy is to appear to play by the rules, but actually do whatever it takes to win; victory at any cost is the goal to strive for"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I prioritize trust and building meaningful connections with people"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Winning is all that matters; it doesn't matter how you play the game"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I’ll do anything to get what I want or the result I want"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"As long as I get what I want, I really don't care what I have to do to get it"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I put the best interests of others above my own interests"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I often feel emotional for others and show them sympathy"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Many people are so gullible that they can be easily tricked or manipulated"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I sympathize with others' feelings"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"People's feelings are more important than getting ahead"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Whatever needs to be done to succeed must be done, including taking advantage of others"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Most people are easy to manipulate"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My self-interest comes before others’ interests"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Other people's feelings are just as important as my own"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I treat others with kindness and compassion"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I prioritize my own self-interest"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Honesty is not the best policy if it is not in my best interest"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Achieving my goals justifies whatever means I must use to get there"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Others' feelings are important to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Other people's feelings are more important than my own"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I always look out for my own self-interests"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I tend to be kind and considerate to others"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It's important to me to get ahead, and I will do what I need to in order to succeed"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"The end justifies the means and I must do whatever is necessary to succeed"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I prioritize my own self-interests over the interests of others"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Winning is more important than how I win"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My needs take precedence over those of others"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Other people's well-being is just as important as my own"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I tend to value the well-being of others"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I aim to be honorable and truthful in everything I do"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Ends over means – by any means necessary as long as it results in a personal favorable outcome"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Ideals are unhealthy, knowing how to manipulate the system will be more beneficial to my success"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I worry about the misfortunes of others"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I would never take advantage of people and deceive or manipulate others to get what I want"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I care about the problems and needs of others"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Winning is everything"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It is never OK to lie to people, even if that helps me achieve my goals"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don't mind being mean to other people if it gets me what I want"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I enjoy helping other people just for the sake of helping"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It's more important to get what I want than for other people to like me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I prioritize the needs of others over my own personal gain"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"For me, the ends always justify the means"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I will do whatever it takes to get ahead"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Successful people do whatever is necessary to win, even if others consider it immoral"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My needs often come before the needs of others"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I strive to help people rather than only focusing on satisfying myself"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It's natural for people to take advantage of others to get ahead"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I feel constant guilt whenever I hurt someone else"
